title: XOR Shift
author: aspol12
description:
Now you can't blame bad RNG on the game.



Check the validity of a displayed number based on XOR Shifting.

most of it done by aspol12
1 line of code borrowed from mafia
manual help by skipzplays and
and an above and beyond potato

The manual can be found in the manuals folder of the game or at ktane.timwi.de.

contact @aspol12 on discord if there are any bugs.
